abstract: Lawyers for accused Boston Marathon bomber Dzhokhar Tsarnaev petition to have his indictment dismissed or trial suspended, citing lack of minorities and young people in jury pool.
lead_paragraph: Lawyers for Dzhokhar Tsarnaev, the Boston Marathon bombing suspect, asked a judge Thursday to dismiss the indictment against him or suspend his trial, saying the jury pool was not diverse.
snippet: Lawyers for Dzhokhar Tsarnaev, the Boston Marathon bombing suspect, asked a judge Thursday to dismiss the indictment against him or suspend his trial, saying the jury pool was not diverse.
